name: cookcli
description: CookCLI is a command-line tool for parsing, scaling, and organizing recipes using CookLang format. It's ideal for developers or chefs wanting to automate recipe management and cooking workflows.
features: Recipe Parsing: Convert CookLang format into structured data. Standardized recipe management.
Automatic Scaling: Adjust ingredient quantities for any serving size. Perfect portions every time.
Command-Line: Powerful CLI tools for recipe automation. Developer-friendly workflow.
Recipe Organization: Manage large recipe collections efficiently. Keep your cookbook organized.
Format Conversion: Export recipes to various formats. Share recipes anywhere.
Workflow Automation: Integrate recipes into cooking apps and systems. Build custom solutions.
